description: This file is the entry point for a React application, responsible for mounting the main App component into the DOM element with id 'app'. It imports React, React DOM's createRoot, the main App component, and a CSS stylesheet, and sets up the React rendering process.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React component in the specified DOM container.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root container.
